Articles.Content:
First Foray into the world of firespitter. anyone got any tips for when i run this monstrosity thorough unity? like how to make constant propeller collision work, since none of the propellers (atleast from KAX Props) have collision when at max speed, and how to get a dynamic ramp up sound when the throttle is brought up.also anyone know how to mess with the tune/pitch of audio in FL studio 11?.

 

Sauce:
